name: Mike Binns
bio: Mike Binns is an Elixir Engineer with DockYard where he enjoys taking on interesting and challenging projects. Mike has been writing Elixir since 2014, and enjoys contributing to the Elixir Open Source ecosystem, including his Elixir libraries such as Ets and Ironman. In his free time he enjoys being a Call Firefighter and spending time with his wife and 4 boys on Boston's North Shore.
